## Site Information

Name: Alberto Alejandro - Portfolio
URL: https://albertoalejandro.nuxt.space
Type: Personal Portfolio / Developer Website

## Author

Name: Alberto Alejandro
Role: Frontend Developer & Systems Engineer
Location: Venezuela
Email: alberto196g@gmail.com

## About

This is a personal portfolio website showcasing professional experience,
projects, and blog posts focused on web development.

Specializations:
- JavaScript / TypeScript
- Vue.js / Nuxt.js
- Frontend Architecture
- SaaS Application Development
- REST API Integration
- UI/UX Implementation

## Content Structure

/                   - Homepage with about, experience, and testimonials
/about              - Detailed about page with personal information
/projects           - Portfolio of completed projects and case studies
/projects/[slug]    - Individual project details
/blog               - Technical blog posts and articles
/blog/[slug]        - Individual blog post

## Key Projects

- Artly - Art marketplace platform
- Bellus - Beauty services application
- CarsWorkflow - Automotive workflow management
- GitHub Scraper - GitHub data extraction tool
- QRS Factory - QR code generation system
- RealtyWeb - Real estate platform
- Trader Buddy - Trading assistant application

## Languages

Primary: English (en)
Secondary: Spanish (es)

All content is available in both languages.

## Technical Stack

This site is built with:
- Nuxt.js 4 (Vue.js framework)
- Nuxt Content (markdown-based CMS)
- Nuxt UI (component library)
- TypeScript

## Robots

Standard web crawlers and AI agents are welcome to index public content.
See /robots.txt for detailed access rules.
